00042 #ifdef _PNFS_MDS
00043 fsal_mdsfunctions_t fsal_ceph_mdsfunctions = {
00044      .layoutget = CEPHFSAL_layoutget,
00045      .layoutreturn = CEPHFSAL_layoutreturn,
00046      .layoutcommit = CEPHFSAL_layoutcommit,
00047      .getdeviceinfo = CEPHFSAL_getdeviceinfo,
00048      .getdevicelist = CEPHFSAL_getdevicelist
00049 };
00050 
00051 fsal_mdsfunctions_t FSAL_GetMDSFunctions(void)

00054 }
00055 #endif /* _PNFS_MDS */
